programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. While many kids would be crushed under such pain and suffering, Frank Shamrock was determined to prove why warriors always find a way to win.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: Jennifer Aniston vs. Brangelina
programme.desc: S1:E12 For almost 20 years, the media portrayed Jennifer Aniston as a heartbroken woman who would never be happy until she had kids. That couldn’t be further from the truth. Our team uncovered details that will prove Brad and Jennifer were the perfect Hollywood couple everybody adored, until Brad suddenly left Jen for Angelina Jolie. This story is so much bigger than Brangelina.

programme.title: Justin Bieber Vs. Hailey Bieber
programme.desc: S2:E7 Justin and Hailey Bieber are at the height of their careers. So why do they keep getting sick? Our team uncovers this isn’t the first time one of Justin’s love interests has had a life-threatening illness. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Selena Gomez with Hailey?

programme.title: Drake Bell vs. Josh Peck
programme.desc: S1:E15 Everyone loved Drake & Josh but people don’t know the dark story behind the world’s favorite kids’ show. Josh struggled with his weight and addiction while filming the show. It was always painful for him to be the chubby sidekick to the cool, popular Drake. Then Josh shocked the world when he revealed that he and Drake weren’t even really friends. Drake was furious, sparking a massive backlash against Josh. But no one knew just how dark of a path Drake had gone down.

programme.title: Britney Spears vs. Justin Timberlake
programme.desc: S1:E8 Did Britney Spears really cheat on Justin Timberlake? Britney and Justin were the perfect couple until she was accused of cheating on him after their breakup. Justin told the world his side of the story and the media believed him while Britney was mocked and silenced. The whole world watched as Britney went from being the media’s pop princess to spiralling in a very public meltdown, but what did Justin have to do with it? Our team uncovered the truth behind what really happened, and what Justin’s iconic Cry Me a River video has to do with Britney’s freedom.

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: Rock Thomas - Rock Bottom
programme.desc: Rock Thomas delivers a powerful, personal story on how to resist the labels forced on you in order to redefine yourself

programme.title: Embrace the Suck
programme.desc: Navy SEAL veteran David Goggins shares how he overcame so many debilitating obstacles to later achieve incredible military and personal honors, and the mentality that kept him going and made him push beyond his limits.

programme.title: Integrity or Nothing
programme.desc: This is how the worlds biggest music manager, Scooter Braun, climbed out of his rock-bottom to make it to the top. What started as sweat, tears and hustle blossomed into a life of generosity and compassion, all because of one important piece of wisdom from his father.

programme.title: Find Your Talent
programme.desc: Tom Bilyeu, co-founder of Quest Nutrition and co-founder & CEO of Impact Theory, reveals how this shift in mindset helped him find his passion.

programme.title: From Thief to Self-Made Millionaire
programme.desc: Watch John Assarafs personal story of growth, the lessons he learned early on in life, and how he went from robber to self-made millionaire by brushing his teeth.

programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: How Venture Capital Works Blackstone vs Blackrock
programme.desc: Venture capital is a two hundred- and fifty-billion-dollar industry that takes your money whether you know it or not and puts it into promising start-ups like, FTX, Theranos, and WeWork but what do these people actually do all day and how are they different from private equity or hedge funds? Venture capital is a type of private equity and private equity is any investment made into a non-public company or security. A private equity fund raises money from investors to buy companies or other assets that are not listed on public exchanges and use them to generate returns. Private companies are much less transparent then public companies which are forced by the SEC and the exchanges to publish financials every quarter in addition to other information that they must keep current. Private companies are also harder to buy or sell since you can’t just open your Robinhood app and buy some shares. The difficulty and illiquidity of dealing with private companies means that investors expect higher returns and the managers running the funds can charge higher fees to compensate them for the extra work. They achieve those high returns through a number of different strategies, one strategy is a buyout fund that will take investor money, take out a large loan on top of that money and use it to buy a large established company that can be made more efficient by laying off staff and improving processes. Another private equity strategy is the rescue fund that buys a failing business for cheap and tries to turn it around, usually by laying off staff and improving processes. But if you don’t have the stomach for firing people all day then Venture Capital is the type of private equity for you. Most of the private equity industry works with established private companies but venture capital invest into businesses that are just getting started. Some private equity investments will be made into businesses that are nothing more than some ideas drawn on a napkin. But what does that actually involve doing? You wake up one day and find out you

programme.title: End of the 40 year career What Do CEOs Actually Do
programme.desc: Go to school, get good grades, get into college, become a professional and work your way up the corporate ladder until you can retire with your savings or a pension. That’s the plan for a lot of people and despite what a lot of hustle bros on the internet might tell you, it’s a good plan if you can stick to it. 9-5 jobs are picked on a lot usually by people that need a way to sell a get rich quick scheme. The standard 40-year professional career has let millions of people enjoy very comfortable lives free from the stress that comes with being in business for themselves, but that is all coming to an end. In just the last 24 months we have experienced quiet quitting, quiet hiring, work shortages AND labor shortages, what a lot of people aren’t talking about though is how this is just the result of companies still trying to make outdated business models work in an age where workers can demand more from their employers. The establishment of the 40-year career is crumbling and there are some employers and employees that are doing a great job taking advantage of it, and there are others that are suffering. The first trend is that despite the pervasive stories about hustle culture and people making partner before the age of 30 while also building out a side business that drop ships physical NFT’s through the myspace storefront, the average worker is not grinding, they are getting less ambitious. A wall street journal article surveyed a range of businesses in demanding fields that are usually staffed by ambitious workers like law, business consulting, and marketing. The companies all reported challenges with getting their employees to go above and beyond which is really corporate speak for working late and coming in on weekends. A law firm told the Wall Street Journal reporters that typically they would have no problem getting junior associates to do extra hours to make sure time sensitive work was completed for their demanding clients. But now new associates have started saying no to working weekends and late nights whi

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: PRISMA
programme.desc: Prisma es un programa cultural producido por CGTN en español en colaboración con el multimedio de comunicación latinoamericano teleSUR. Su objetivo es mostrar a los televidentes la riqueza cultural de China y el mundo hispanohablante, elevar el conocimiento de la cultura china en los países de habla hispana y establecer una plataforma de diálogo entre ambas partes. Se trata de un programa mensual de 30 minutos de duración que comenzó a emitirse en agosto de 2016. Está compuesto de tres segmentos que destacan por su diversidad temática. Primero, un espacio de noticias culturales; después, una semblanza de alguna personalidad del ámbito cultural latinoamericano; y finalmente un documental sobre aspectos de la cultura china.

programme.title: Interchangeable Looks
programme.desc: Get more mileage out of garments with interchangeable looks. Designer and DIY expert Jane Monzures makes a cool apron from some favorite t-shirts. Redesign maker Laura Pifer restyles a t-shirt by adding bell sleeves. Joanne Banko adds a couture touch to ready-to-wear and jazzes it up with machine embroidery.

programme.title: The 1950's Boom and Rock
programme.desc: In the 1950's, every teenager had a transistor radio and went to the sock hop. Designer and sewing expert Gretchen Hirsch shows how to make an updated circle skirt for today. Lisa Shaw adds contemporary machine-embroidery to a cardigan sweater, inspired by the sweaters of the 1950's. Gretchen returns to show how to add a gathered crinoline to make the skirt really full and flirty.

programme.title: Mix Up Your Daily Schedule
programme.desc: Get out of the design rut and mix things up. Artist Anne Potter transforms recycled tea tins into fashionable earrings. Then, she gives tips on hosting a jewelry party so you can work out design ideas with friends. Cool down as clay sculptor Syndee Holt creates colorful seascapes on polymer clay pendants.

programme.title: Embellish It
programme.desc: Embellish it: with twisted wire and bead earrings. Learn about simple beaded edgings with Jean Campbell, and crystallizing your flats with Kellie DeFries. Three ways to add embellishments for a look that's all your own.

programme.title: It's All in the Details
programme.desc: It's the little things that count – from the tiniest embellishment to the handwritten letter - it's all in the details today on Scrapbook Soup. Create simple cut out graphic cards, learn about packing tape photo transfer with Sara Naumann, and backgrounds almost as pretty as the picture in a prom layout with Stacey Caron– today on Scrapbook Soup.

programme.title: The Knitting Circle Presented by CraftsyTV
programme.desc: Learn to knit, step-by-step with The Knitting Circle experts on CraftsyTV.

programme.title: The Midnight Quilt Show

programme.title: Birthday
programme.desc: Talia breaks down, while Nimrod is partying. Uri and Nurit try to bridge the gap after 17 years. After meeting Yinon, Yael puts Amiel's items in storage. Haim further investigates Amiel's whereabouts. Yussuf and Abdullah handle an arms deal.

programme.title: Parodies
programme.desc: A good parody requires the alchemy of a hit genre, a recognizable film, a funny script, and top-notch actors. Hosts Sara Greenfield and Gregory Cohen discuss some of the best parodies, including Airplane, Scream, Scary Movie & Young Frankenstein.!

programme.title: Touring with Writer Phillip Lopate

programme.title: Distance

programme.title: Yolande: An Unsung Heroine
programme.desc: The story of Yolande Gabai de Botton, considered the Jewish "Mata Hari." From Alexandria, Egypt, she risked her son's life and her own to collect intelligence and fight for creation of an independent Israel while undercover as a reporter.

programme.title: The Corpse Vanishes (1942)

programme.title: IN THE CLOSET
programme.desc: 2045, two brothers form the Black Foundation, a movement in the U. S. that suggests the Government apologize to slave descendants for their hardships, and bestow on them reparations by any means necessary.. ..Or Holy Hell will break loose.. Luke, the oldest son, discovers the power and guidance of Christ and tries to save himself but his brother and father as well.Wrong actions brings a Demon into the life of the two brothers:Will Christ prevail, or will the Demons efforts consume the Maxwell Family?

programme.title: INVISIBLE YOUNG
programme.desc: Over a four-year period, Rachel lived on the streets of Seattle, saw close friends die, and she was herself beaten on several occasions. Michael was five years old when he was placed in foster care. Over the next 11 years, Michael would see over 70 different placements. Several times he ran away - life on the streets was more to his liking. Jacklyn grew up with a mother who was a perfect candidate for the TV show Hoarders. Jacklyn describes her father as a violent, abusive, alcoholic drug addict. So at 13 when a friend took her to meet some homeless kids living under a bridge in town, Jacklyn knew she had found a new life. She would spend the next eight years on the streets. Jackson had a more traditional home life. But early exposure to drugs in his teen years resulted in Jackson choosing homelessness upon graduating high school. After several years hopping trains and living on the streets, a near brush with death forced him to reassess his situation.

programme.title: IRON RIDGE
programme.desc: When two friends from the big city, Jake Munro (Casey Anderson) and William Price (Stu Brumbaugh) go deep into the back country of Montana for a once in a lifetime trip, They find themselves in the middle of one of the worlds most rugged and hostile environments. When one of the young men finds himself lost in the mountain terrain of the Big Sky country unprepared and unequipped, he will have only his instinctive skills and the dedication of a determined semi-retired forest ranger (Randy Barrett) to save his life. With a bad winter storm rolling in and the search being called off, it is just a matter of time before the lost hunter realizes that his chances of survival are hopeless, especially when he learns that a bloodthirsty grizzly (Brutus the Bear) is tracking him. Now, with life-threatening injuries he will attempt to do the unthinkable, even if it costs him his life. With the history of the area and the vast forest system of the Iron Ridge mountain range it will be a miracle if he makes it out alive.

programme.title: LIFE IS A CARNIVAL
programme.desc: Six Incredible and dynamic actors, that has brought this project cinematographic, into something very unique and original. Even thou each charters has a very wild and unchallenging roles to deal with, their talents was in how they were able to separates the laughters from the cries to then suddenly breath again an atmosphere of full of romance where dreams magically can come true.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 66
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: FIRST COME FIRST SERVE
programme.desc: Sundar wakes up late and finds a glaring Chai Raja stand towering over him. He rushes to take his station as business begins but alas his headache is about to get much worse for Basha has decided to sabotage each and every customer who walks in Chai Rajas door that day. To make matters worse, a wrestler turns up at the shop and demands that he be the one to be served first always. Chai Rajas rhythm is distorted by the wrestlers hankering and all goes for a toss. Basha disguises and manages to grab the wrestlers attention who now demands that Sundar serve Basha. But Sundar finds out its Basha and chases him. The lovestruck wrestler, woebegone at losing his love punches Sundar into orbit while Basha looks on gleefully.

programme.title: TEA TO TANGO
programme.desc: Basha arrives at the hotel ready to stack up his belly with fritters, but the said organ of his flips like a pancake when he sees the most bewitching of female primates sitting with her owner at Chai Rajas tea shop. Basha is all set to sweep her off her dainty hairy feet but minutes before that Sundar, fumbling one of his deliveries trips on Chai Rajas new jackfruit dessert and ends up doing a complicated tappangutthumove ; which as fate would have it sits absolutely in tune with the music that played on the radio. The female monkey who until now looked comatose jerks to rapturous attention. She cant take her eyes off Sundar. Basha horrified at this unexpected attention-switch tries some classy Tango to woo her. Sundar though slightly irritated by the fawning female monkey, is amused at Bashas frustration there begins an impromptu dance off between Sundar and Basha. Sadly for Basha, all the suave leaps and twists dont seem to impress the damsel of his dreams. Sundar too is in danger of facing flak from Chai Raja for delivering more tappangutthuthan tea! Sundar knowingly trips up letting Basha win the affections of the lady finally...and a pleasant surprise from Basha awaits Sundar as he drags feet to wash the dishes!

programme.title: BIG BUNNY
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to prepare a big feast. Pai sees this as his chance to impress the Elders and earn a new weapon to replace his Mystic Stick. But when he goes to collect the rare striped carrot (a crucial ingredient for his dish), he’s attacked by a Giant Bunny Mutant sent by Negu. His Mystic Stick helps him defeat the Mutant, so he’s content with his weapon…for now.

programme.title: The North Wind and the Sun
programme.desc: The North Wind and the Sun collide over whos stronger. They set a bet, to see who can make the passing traveler take off his jacket first.

programme.title: Let Me Fly
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Tarantula Twist
programme.desc: A wealthy eccentric bureaucrat from South America is saunters into the tea shop one day. Chai Raja is eager to please the bureaucrat and cordons off a VIP section for him- however such demarcations are of no consequence when Basha and Sundar are locked in a manic chase. The naughty Basha manoeuvres Sundar into crashing past the barricade and upsetting the careful setup. The blustering bureaucrat is all set to throw a fit when suddenly he sees something and shrieks in childlike delight. Its a massive spider that often lurks about the tea-shop. Fishing out a delicate collectors glass case with exotic arachnids, the foreigner eagerly points at the one missing species that he has not yet managed to bag. He wants the spider Pronto! Chai Raja orders Sundar to nab said arachnid but Sundar is frankly freaked out. He gingerly sets about his task as the bureaucrat taps manicured fingers in impatience but finds its not going to be easy as Basha just to spite Sundar has decided to team up with the Tarantula and preserve the latters freedom. The tarantula in its turn, is no pushover and proves deft and spinning inventive webs that not only trap people but bounce them off or string them up etc. The many booby traps Sundar lays all backfire and finally end in bureaucrats glass case rupturing and the collected chasing the collector. While Sundar gets his spatula dues from Chai Raja. Basha and the Tarantula hi-five- one against seven

programme.title: Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Electric Chase
programme.desc: They are so fed up of the rats that colonel comes up with an idea to tame them – an electronic super cat! And it works! The rats are terrified of it. Now it is the rule of the dogs. Until..until the idea backfires. Watch it for a hilarious time.

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlies
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: A Book for a Book
programme.desc: Cat is sick of Keet winning all the time. He runs through the newspapers and sees an ad of a book ”10 ways to catch a parrot”.

programme.title: TRING TRING
programme.desc: The days are getting busier at the hotel and the constant running around and hauling plates etc is getting to Sundar. He just wishes he could quickly finish up and snooze the rest of the time. After an especially hectic day of waiting/cleaning, Sundar cant believe his luck when he finds an old busted cycle near the backyard of the Hotel. With a little tinkering (taking parts out), Sundar manages to change it into a unicycle that will help him clean up and wait tables faster. What Sundar doesnt expect is that balancing on a unicycle can be quite a tricky issue he botches up the deliveries badly and Chai Raja orders him to get rid of the unicycle. Sundar does so with a heavy heart but imagine his surprise when the next day morning he wakes up to a familiar bell- its the unicycleits back and Basha is on it. What hurts more is that Chai Raja is encouraging it as Basha on the unicycle is helping amp up the customer flow. Sundar wants his unicycle back not only because he believes it should him getting the applause but also because the nifty Basha is using the unicycle performance as a faade to stealing fritters. Sundar and Basha have a showdown and Sundar getting carried away, performs with such a frenzy that ultimately he crashes the pantry down. The final shot is off Sundar cleaning up the mess wearing the cycle tire as a reluctant garland.

programme.title: The Egg
programme.desc: Gummy wakes up with a mysterious egg in his bedroom – and, over Harry’s objections, becomes convinced that it’s ‘Junior’, a future soccer star!

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn Ene
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: BITTEN BY BUG
programme.desc: Buzz falls head over heels for a mysterious, secret admirer who just moved into the library. Suspicious of her true motives, Googly and Iris try to warn Buzz that he knows nothing about his new friend and that she may not be as nice as she seems, but he ignores their advice. After agreeing to meet his new friend for lunch, Buzz learns the hard way that love can really hurt - literally. Watch the brand new, full episode here and find out how Buzz got a boo boo, and why he needed an emergency ride in an ambulance to see the doctor, in another exciting adventure of Creepy Candy

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: PAI PROBLEM
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Magic Fort overnight. Negu sends a mutant that’s a clone of Pai. Pai has to defeat himself using his own self-knowledge.

programme.title: The Golden Fish
programme.desc: Fisherman GoGo catches the scarce golden fish, I-Go, but frees her. To repay for GoGos kindness, I-Go promises to grant his wishes, and Gogo wishes his greedy wife, WI-Gos longing to be rich.

programme.title: Scared
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala watch a scary late-show on TV – and all wind up too scared to go to bed, their imaginations soon running wild...

programme.title: SOMETHING STINKS
programme.desc: Negu has his henchmen pump a foul green fog up to the Yan World, forcing the Elders to evacuate the Westerly Breeze. Aboard the Lord of the Wind, Pai fails to impress the Elders and gets “Rocky Rodent” – a crisis of confidence. The Elders have to pump Pai’s confidence back up so he can help Xia and April defeat the Worm Monster sent by Negu.

programme.title: Shivery Timbers
programme.desc: Mildred the ghost has had just about enough of the Creepy Candys noisy shenanigans and wants the library quiet.It is then the Creepy Candy find a secret treasure map and decide to follow it. The clues lead our daring swashbucklers on a high seas adventure of danger and mystery.Will they discover a hidden treasure? What will it begold, jewels, chocolate? Will Mildred ever be happy? Watch this exciting episode of Shivery Timbers and find out!

programme.title: A Merry Ride
programme.desc: The giant wheel whirs like a wind mill and rolls down the hill. The merry go round is more like a shooting brigade. This amusement park has rides and games with a twist, for Don, Colonel, Charly, Marly and Lary are all geared up to have a fun-filled outing!

programme.title: BUDDY SYSTEM
programme.desc: Xia rejects April’s advice on a fighting move, accepting the identical advice from Pai. Maestra Saku says today they’ll study using the Buddy System. Xia’s paired with Saku and has to knit while April and Pai learn much more exciting lessons in the forest. But the knitting lessons pay off when Xia uses his new skills to rescue April and Pai from a giant mutant spider. Xia learns females give excellent advice on fighting!

programme.title: Happy Halloween
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: I Lee
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: This Is Speed Racer
programme.desc: The kids use the Mach 6 time machine to travel back in time to change their bleak future. They see the origins of the time travel car, their parents, and the rise of the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Prima donna
programme.desc: The twins help a girl become a movie star, but she becomes a primadonna.

programme.title: Clothespin
programme.desc: What can Hepi and Briko make with. Clothes pin? Lets find out!

programme.title: "Water, Water Every Where"
programme.desc: GrandPA takes the trio for a small ride to the nearby towns newly opened mini waterpark. Cat is all excited and is wearing water goggles and a snorkeling gear.

programme.title: Mystic Stick Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Pai complains that his stick is just like any other ordinary stick, Negu sends a horde of fake sticks, fans and swords to the Guardians. The weapons come to life and rebel against their supposed masters. April, Xia and especially Pai have to learn to connect with their own weapons to defeat the fake ones.

programme.title: Plastic Bottle
programme.desc: Watch Hepi an Briko transform plastic bottles to something out of this world. Literally.

programme.title: Pinecone
programme.desc: Creativity has no limits, watch Hepi and Briko transform these cones into something lovely

programme.title: Plastic Spoon
programme.desc: Hepi and Briko reuse spoons to make some cute DIYs

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: MONDO YAWN
programme.desc: Maestro Woof is having trouble sleeping. The Guardians try to cure his insomnia. The other Elders make a sleeping tonic, but Pai mistakes it for lemonade and drinks it. Xia and April discover a Mutant Raccoon from Negu is keeping Maestro Woof awake. Pai “sleep-fights” the raccoon brilliantly, but can’t do it when he’s awake. With the Elders’ help, the Guardians defeat the raccoon. Worn out, Maestro Woof falls asleep.

programme.title: The Macaroni Plant
programme.desc: Gummy is determined to grow his favourite food – even if macaroni plants don’t exist!

programme.title: King couch potato
programme.desc: The twins travel to a medieval castle where they meet a king who is too comfortable and lazy to ever leave home.

programme.title: Katreena the Cat
programme.desc: There’s a new hot kitten called katreena ,’Kitty’ in short, has just come visiting her friend Dunky. She is so hot that Cat will do anything to just be with her.

programme.title: Sing us back home
programme.desc: a panda steals Ragoo’s bamboo stick. She flees through the trees and the twins chase him, so they all end up lost

programme.title: Mr. Pancake's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Pancake doesn’t follow instructions and goes on a wild joy ride! Understanding and following directions is important.

programme.title: Happy ending
programme.desc: The twins jump into a story and find out that the characters are stuck, because the last pages of the book are missing. So the twins invent the ending themselves, discovering the power of imagination, and when they go back home they understand they can create a new recipe with the ingredients they’ve got.

programme.title: The Deep Freeze
programme.desc: After not following the steps to find Odessas hidden treasure, a frustrated Pancake enters the Zooniverse to find it covered in ice and snow. To "turn back on" Mt Zoonihorn, he must follow the steps and learn from his friends mistakes. Determination and following the correct steps can lead to success.

programme.title: The Vegetarians
programme.desc: We start the episode with Cat holding an upset stomach and at doctors place with Dunky and Keet. The doctor tells him he cannot have non veg and should be on a veg diet.

programme.title: Bark or Bleat
programme.desc: When Gummy brings home a weird looking Goat home thinking that it is a Dog, Harry has a mad time convincing him otherwise. But what Gummy does not know is that he is in for a surprise.

programme.title: Mango Season
programme.desc: It’s the mango season and Dunky has to guard all the mangoes so that no one will steal them. He has taken the help of Cat and Keet to guard them from Hoodie and the mean cat gang.

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Cat notices that Katreena is a big fan of “macho man” a well built super star .He needs to build his physique and impress her.

programme.title: Sssshhhhh!!!
programme.desc: The twins use their joke kit to help a young Ice-witch with a cold to gain favour with her dour compatriots.

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: Bark or Bleat
programme.desc: When Gummy brings home a weird looking Goat home thinking that it is a Dog, Harry has a mad time convincing him otherwise. But what Gummy does not know is that he is in for a surprise.

programme.title: Maroon
programme.desc: When Kala tells Gummy and Harry that her favourite color is maroon, the pair decide to give her an ‘all maroon’ birthday surprise – but they soon learn that there can sometimes be ‘too much of a good thing’.

programme.title: Much to Your Surprise
programme.desc: When Maple ruins a surprise meant for Pancake, she finds out in the Zooniverse that surprises are only surprising when they are surprises. Seeing things from other people’s points of view can make things easier to understand.

programme.title: Samir and the Sky Lamp
programme.desc: Samir plans to launch a lantern into the sky and measure how far it rises but his experiment is cut short by the Grand Vizier. Mild mannered Samir does not argue with authority and obeys the Grand Viziers orders but Jamillah and Aladdin see the injustice of the situation and convince Samir that he should go ahead with his experiment. Unfortunately taking their advice gets Samir arrested. Jamillah, Aladdin and Genie fly Samirs lamp for him and Samir, spurred on by Jamillah and Aladdins example states his case to the Sultan. Samir is delighted when his bravery is rewarded and the Sultan releases him, it turns out the Sultan is also a man of science and is delighted with Samirs experiment, much to the Grand Viziers annoyance.

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: Trekker's Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is visiting his distant cousin in a remote area .the next day Dunky has woken up early and takes the sleepy parrot Keet and Cat for a morning trek to the mountains.

programme.title: Hopeless Dreams
programme.desc: Cat is taking a cat nap as Keet flies in and bangs a pan on Cats head and wakes him up. Cat gets up in a start and amazed by what he sees.

programme.title: Love Me Not
programme.desc: Don is sitting in the bathtub, smiling. He slips down further and gets comfy as he lies in the tub.He turns over and pulls the cushion around his neck closer. Only, it’s not a cushion. It’s an OCTOPUS!And its in love with Colonel!

programme.title: Bottle Racquet
programme.desc: Fred and friends don’t have a place to play “Laser Ball.” An eccentric environmentalist inspires Fred to build his own island out of discarded plastic water bottles. When Friday is sent to collect a quarter million of them, he turns into a plastic water bottle menace!

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: Girlfriends Are A Girl’s Best Friend
programme.desc: Fred pushes Brains to try to get more girlfriends, and fit in more at school. Since other girls are all reading the “Ghostlight” books, Brains tries it, and gets hooked. Fred doesn’t get the books girly appeal, and worries that he’s going to lose Brains to her new girly romance-loving crowd.

programme.title: Mr. Pancake's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Pancake doesn’t follow instructions and goes on a wild joy ride! Understanding and following directions is important.

programme.title: The Thing That Slept Over
programme.desc: An alien slug monster that inhabits it’s victims has possessed some girl at school, but Brains doesn’t know which one. She awkwardly throws her first slumber party to figure it out. Simone, the new girl Fred has a crush on, carries the alien, and attracts Fred and Sir Percival to sap their human energy!

programme.title: A “Bumpy” Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: Where’s Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: Surprise Birthday Mix-Up
programme.desc: Twins, Zip and Zap, compete to out-surprise each other with the best birthday party ever, while Villains diguised as a present sneak in to the castle to steal the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Lost Lamp
programme.desc: Aladdin discovers his mother has sold the lamp for money. He rushes to the lamp sellers stall when Jamillah arrives, causing a mess everywhere. When Aladdin tells her that Genie has been sold she hatches a plan and dresses up as a noble woman with Aladdin as her servant in order to get him back. Whilst she distracts the lamp seller Aladdin tries to find Genie except theres one problem - there are hundreds of lamps! The lamp seller sees through their disguise and banishes them away but they return and manage to get the lamp only to have the Grand Vizier walk away with it. Jamillah tricks him by trading a pocket torch she has from home, getting the lamp back and saving Genie.

programme.title: Giants And Bigheads
programme.desc: Fred volunteers his friends to work on the school parade as a scheme to get them a day off of school.

programme.title: Pesky Rodents – Pied Pipper
programme.desc: Sandra and Fo go into the tale of the Pied Piper of Hamelin, called by the town’s schoolmistress. There, they discover that something very strange has happened in the story. The Pied Piper, with his magic flute, has taken off all the children and has left the mice in the town, contradicting the classic sequence of events. The detective and her assistant must solve the mystery and return the children to their families safe and sound.

programme.title: Where is it?
programme.desc: During a game of hide and seek Deedee and Nino come across a panicky Mewmew who cannot locate his key. Deedee creates a spell to get back all of Mewmew’s missing things and in come his key, including his long lost bubble-cordion and pocket fork. But Mewmew doesn’t want those things back as he had already replaced them. So Deedee offers to keep them as she couldn’t stand the sight of them being thrown away. On the way they find Charlie hiding from his lost but newly found alarm clock that is chasing him. The clock won’t let Charlie sleep a bit by ringing all the time, so Deedee offers to take it along with the rest. Deedee gets many more additions to her lost and found group as many more citizens of Abra-Dabra are affected with lost things. But as Deedee doesn’t have any space to store them, she puts up a give-away store. Now everyone’s happy.

programme.title: Easter Egg Surprise Smash
programme.desc: Its the Easter Eggstravanganza and Sneevil traps Smighties in googs - slime-filled gooey eggs. Luckily, Dude is able to crack the secret code and help the Super Six rescue them in time.

programme.title: Non Stop Dance Party
programme.desc: Melody creates a tune so catchy that she puts all the Smighties into a trance. Its up to her to now save the day and stop the villains with her powerful music.

programme.title: BADminton
programme.desc: Marco & Polo are playing badminton in the backyard like a sweet family. Then the shuttle cock falls on Cats head as he is about to catch Keet.

programme.title: Moon Charmer
programme.desc: Samir the local snake charmer is trying unsuccessfully to charm a snake out of his basket and the market is growing restless until Jamillah arrives and all of the market is in awe! When she explains where she comes from Samir is thrilled and asks her to accompany him to see a rare astrological site, a blood moon. But its a sight best seen from above and the greatest viewing spots are outside the city gates which are locked at night not to mention the law expressly forbidding anyone to leave. When they try to leave via a secret door a guard catches them, but just when all hope seems lost Jamillah has an idea - the magic carpet! And with that they take off into a night sky filled with a big red moon.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Julie tiene 36, está sin trabajo y soltera, así que ha decidido tomar las riendas de su destino.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Julie tiene un plan para conquistar el corazón de Max, el hombre de sus sueños al que todavía no conoce.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Julie debe elegir entre una historia de amor real y una historia de un hipotético amor ideal.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Max y Julie pasaron la noche juntos y fue maravilloso, pero después se encuentran a la mujer que él ama.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Stéphane se ve despampanante en la foto del calendario del club de rugby. Ava intenta recuperar a sus hijos.

programme.title: Wija
programme.desc: Director: Khaled Youssef - Cast: Hany Salama / Sherif Mounir / Menna Shalaby / Hend Sabry - Year of production: 2006

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Becoming Evil: Serial Killers
programme.desc: Theres been a long-held belief in the public that serial killing is largely an American phenomenon. That America, with its large faceless urban centers, street prostitution, poor and neglected inner cities, drug problems, and homelessness, is not only a unique breeding ground for murdering psychopaths but has created a ready-made victim pool for serial killers. Now we know serial killing has no boundaries.

programme.title: Becoming Evil: Serial Killers
programme.desc: 21st-century America is a technological wonder: cell phones, internet, 24 hour news media, DNA breakthroughs, people on the move, amd expanding urban centers. But many of the old problems remain: drug addiction, homelessness, prostitution, poverty, gangs, murder, and serial killing. Starting in the 1990s serial killing in America has transitioned and adapted to the changing world, while at the same time in many ways staying the same. What has changed: There is new forensic technology particularly DNA analysis, better cooperation between law-enforcement jurisdictions, increasing awareness and fascination in the media and on the Internet with the serial killer.

programme.title: Raiders of Galaxy 1982
programme.desc: A group of young space cadets use a technologically advanced mecha to combat an evil extraterrestrial race that is trying to take over the galaxy

programme.title: Aladdin and His Wonderful Lamp 1939
programme.desc: Working in the story department of Surprise Pictures, Olive Oyl writes a script based on the story of Aladdin, casting Popeye as the thief and herself as the Princess

programme.title: Customers Wanted 1939
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto compete in their penny arcades for Wimpy's business

programme.title: Pudgy and the Lost Kitten 1938
programme.desc: Pudgy and the Lost Kitten

programme.title: The Candid Candidate- 1937
programme.desc: Betty Boop campaigns for Grampy for Mayor; he wins by one vote, but finds politics is no picnic. Urban renewal is parodied.

programme.title: Cookin' with Gags 1955
programme.desc: The boys are taking Olive on a picnic. It's April 1, and Bluto plays a series of "jokes" on Popeye, though of course they go beyond the bounds of acceptability, particularly once they get to the picnic grounds; Bluto puts gasoline on the fire he asks Popeye to light and swaps a beehive for the lemonade. Bluto then launches a cruel joke against Olive and frames Popeye. The capper: he replaces Popeye's spinach with a joke can, and runs off with Olive for some canoeing. But Popeye gets the last laugh with an inflatable sea monster.

programme.title: A Cartoonist's Nightmare 1935
programme.desc: A cartoonist falls victim to the very villains he has drawn. It's up to Beans the Cat to save the day.

programme.title: Rocket Bye Baby 1956
programme.desc: A cosmic mix-up results in a Martian baby being delivered to Earth, while an Earth baby is sent to Mars. Joseph Wilbur and his wife try to raise the green-skinned, ingenious Martian tyke as if he were an Earthling. But the kid builds his own spaceship and flies away, and Wilbur must find him and bring him back, or he'll never be able to make an exchange with the Martian parents for his own boy.

programme.title: Ancient Fistory 1953
programme.desc: It's the middle ages (sort of); Popeye is working in Bluto's Beanery. Bluto is going to the ball where Princess Olive will choose her mate. Popeye's fairy godpappy appears and it's a reverse Cinderella story, with a car created from a can of spinach.

programme.title: The Weakly Reporter 1944
programme.desc: A newsreel spoof with WWII homefront gags, including rationing, air raid drills and women filling in men's jobs.

programme.title: The Playful Polar Bears-1938
programme.desc: A joyfully contented group of polar bears encounter danger when hunters arrive.

programme.title: Land of the Lost Jewels 1950
programme.desc: Two children are fishing when they catch a talking fish named Red Lantern. He takes them underwater with him to the Land of the Lost, where missing items can be found again. They meet King Find All, a walrus, and a singing cricket (Hoppy-Go-Lucky) that used to be the girl's pin. He's deemed to be a special jewel (since he's made of emerald) and is brought to the jewel storage room, despite his wishes to be in the Land of the Toys. He runs away from Queen Tiara's guards, but is caught, and when they test him for authenticity they find he is only a fake diamond, after which he is allowed to live in the Land of the Toys after all. The children return to the surface and say goodbye to Red Lantern.

programme.title: I'm in the Army Now 1936
programme.desc: To impress Olive, Bluto and Popeye try to convince an Army recruiter to sign him up.

programme.title: Sintel -2010
programme.desc: In this epic fantasy tale, Sintel - a young lonely girl - finds companion in a wounded baby dragon, in the streets of a city in decay

programme.title: Greek Mirthology 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is trying to get his nephews to eat their spinach, so he tells them about how Hercules (Popeye) defeated a bully (Bluto). Hercules gets his strength by sniffing garlic; he wins numerous tests of strength against the bully until the bully spots him sniffing garlic. The bully pulls out a handy bottle of chlorophyll and douses the garlic, disabling Hercules. He then knocks him into a field of spinach where Hercules discovers a new and better source of strength.

programme.title: Jumpin' Jupiter 1955
programme.desc: Porky and Sylvester's desert campground is sliced away and towed into outer space by a green, bird-like Jupiterian searching for earthly animal life. But Porky remains blissfully unaware, leaving Sylvester to be terrorized by the alien.

programme.title: Superman cartoons 6
programme.desc: Superman cartoons 6

programme.title: Boy Meets Dog 1938
programme.desc: A commercial short made for the Bristol-Myers Co. (plugging their toothpaste) that features the characters from the "Reg'lar Fellers" syndicated newspaper comic strip by Gene Byrnes. The plot concerns a boy who has an old grouch for a daddy, runs off, meets a dog and joins a gang of kids. Meanwhile,the old man has a nightmare,where he sees himself as an old sour puss because he doesn't take care of his teeth and gums. He sees an electric sign for Bristol-Myers toothpaste, and that sets him on a more positive course. (The few-seconds of film showing the sign represents the only commercial intrusion in this short)

programme.title: Popeye for President
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto are running for president; it's election day, the vote is tied, and Olive is the only remaining voter

programme.title: Parlor, Bedroom and Bath-1931
programme.desc: A man tries passing off a socially awkward fellow as a Casanova in the hopes of marrying off his would be sister-in-law.

programme.title: Hard Luck -1921
programme.desc: Strange things ensue after a young man attempts to take his own life.

programme.title: The Loudspeaker-1934
programme.desc: A young man from a small town heads to New York, determined to become a radio star. He achieves his goal but in the process alienates those around him.

programme.title: The Fatal Glass of Beer 1933
programme.desc: The prodigal son of a Yukon prospector comes home on a night that "ain't fit for man nor beast."

programme.title: Father's Little Dividend 1951
programme.desc: Shortly after coming to terms with his daughter's marriage, a father faces the prospect of becoming a grandfather

programme.desc: A group of down-on-their-luck workers combine their abilities to make a Gallafentian-style commune... and bread!

programme.title: Guns in the Dark 1937
programme.desc: When Johnny and Mendez argue, the lights go out, and in the ensuing gunfight Johnny thinks he killed his friend Dick. Now refusing to wear a gun he crosses the border. But it is not long before he runs into Mendez and more trouble.

programme.title: Roll Along, Cowboy-1937
programme.desc: Singing cowboy Randy shows up at Mrs. Blake's ranch. She is beset by bad guys, and Randy loves her daughter Janet.

programme.title: Saul and David 1964
programme.desc: In Saul and David, the epic struggle of faith, jealousy, and destiny unfolds on the grand scale of biblical history. When humble shepherd David rises to fame after defeating Goliath, he becomes a loyal servant to King Saul. But as David’s popularity grows, Saul’s envy turns to fury, sparking a tragic conflict between king and chosen heir. With sweeping battles, powerful drama, and timeless themes of loyalty and betrayal, this historical epic brings one of the Bible’s most gripping stories to life.

programme.title: The Jack Benny Christmas Show 1961
programme.desc: In The Jack Benny Christmas Show, holiday cheer meets classic comedy as Jack Benny brings his trademark wit to a festive television special. Joined by his regular cast and surprise guests, Benny’s dry humor and perfectly timed gags light up the season with laughter. Blending sketches, music, and holiday spirit, this variety show captures the warmth and fun of Christmas in true Jack Benny style.

programme.title: Santa Claus vs The Devil 1959
programme.desc: In Santa Claus vs. The Devil, Christmas magic collides with mischief in a one-of-a-kind holiday fantasy. As Santa prepares for his yearly journey, the Devil sends his wicked helper Pitch to tempt children and ruin the season of giving. From a workshop in the clouds to fiery battles of good versus evil, Santa must outwit the forces of darkness to deliver joy across the world. Whimsical, bizarre, and unforgettable, this cult classic proves that not even the Devil himself can steal Christmas.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: This episode of Behind the Blend features Nick Perdomo of Perdomo Cigars, who shares his family's long lineage in cigar making, his journey from air traffic controller to building a vertically integrated cigar empire, and the company's meticulous 18-step quality control process.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: The Cigar Box Lounge in Edgewood, Florida, offers a comfortable and community-focused cigar experience, featuring a wide selection of cigars, unique amenities like complimentary coffee and bottle service, and a strong commitment to exceptional customer service.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: A hidden gem in the heart of Tampa. Known for its inviting atmosphere and extensive selection of premium cigars, Sterling offers both seasoned aficionados and curious newcomers a place to unwind. The episode dives into the lounge‚Äôs history, the art of cigar pairing, and the vibrant community it fosters.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Established in 2019, Drunk Chicken Cigars (DC Cigars) are handmade in the U.S.A. to create premium flavor profiles. Every combination of tobacco leaf, including the filler, binder, and wrapper, was chosen to produce an assortment of smooth, rich, and savory cigars with a variety of customers in mind. Join Sean has he dicusses the mission of the DC Cigars family is to produce premium cigars that can be smoked anytime of the day.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: In this episode of Behind the Blend, Sean interviews Willy Marante, the national sales manager and East Coast representative for La Aurora Cigars. Willy discusses La Aurora's history as one of the oldest brands in the Dominican Republic, celebrating 122 years, and highlights key products like the newly redesigned 100 Años and the colorful Preferidos lines. He shares insights into his journey from a career in music to cigar sales, the importance of grassroots marketing for small brands, and how the cigar industry fosters a sense of community that transcends social and professional backgrounds.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: This episode visits Cremo Cigar Factory in Miami, showcasing the brand's long history, the intricate cigar-making process by master rollers, and their interactive "Cigar Factory Experience" which allows visitors to learn and hand-roll their own cigars.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: Join Bryan Baiss and Chris Kelly as they give the Plascencia Alma Fuerte Robustus II a full review. Will it stand up to the hype or burn under pressure?

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: In this episode of Unrolled, host Bryan Baiss visits the renowned Casa Perfecto lounge. Join Bryan as he takes you on a tour of this iconic lounge, exploring its atmosphere, cigar selection, and what makes it a must-visit spot for cigar lovers.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: Brian and Chris, your trusted tobacco experts, tackle the unique Drew Estate Year of the Rat cigar. They'll dissect its distinctive blend, construction, and flavor nuances, offering their seasoned perspectives on this celebrated release. Tune in to see if this Year of the Rat lives up to the hype and earns their stamp of approval.

programme.title: Guest Joshua Rothman
programme.desc: Slavery is America's dirty little secret, which is why there's so many misconceptions and misinformation that's in history books and circling around society today. The hierarchy of slavery, the business that it took to make it work and become successful, and the slave societies that thrived as a result of it are all not often talked about. Listen in to a fascinating conversation with Joshua Rothman, author and professor at the University of Alabama, that starts with the origins of slavery, to the ships, and then to the plantation. Regardless of which part you look at, a slave trader was involved every step of the way.

programme.title: Guest Dedrick Asante-Muhammad
programme.desc: AURN White House Correspondent Ebony McMorris sits down with the President of the ‪Joint Center Dedrick Asante-Muhammad for a conversation about power, policy and the price of progress for Black America under the Donald Trump‬ administration.

programme.title: Idris Elba & Kid Capri
programme.desc: Actor Idris Elba shares insight into the parallels between storytelling and film and video games, and how both mediums can captivate audiences in unique ways. He shares his thoughts on which rap artists he feels emulate his acting work as Knuckles in Sonic The Hedgehog 2. Then Kid Capri's in the building! He dives into the evolution of Hip Hop, its impact on gaming, and the undeniable power of music in elevating game experiences. Video Games Mentioned: Cyberpunk 2077 Phantom Liberty, Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth, Tekken 8, Prince of Persia Lost Crown, Bulletstorm VR.

programme.title: September 29, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for September 29, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guest Brianna Arps
programme.desc: Join us for an inspiring conversation with Brianna Arps, the visionary founder and CEO of MOODEAUX, a fragrance label that's disrupting the industry with its authenticity and innovation. In this episode, Brianna shares her remarkable journey from beauty editor to entrepreneur, revealing how a job loss sparked her entrepreneurial spirit and led to the creation of MOODEAUX. Delving into her deep fascination with fragrance and the scientific intricacies that drive her passion, Brianna reflects on the challenges of entrepreneurship, including the importance of self-belief and continuous learning. Together, they explore the significance of black representation in the fragrance industry and Brianna's role in founding Black in Fragrance, a support network for black perfumers. Brianna also discusses her recent accomplishment of being one of Beauty Matter Next 2023 grant recipients, highlighting her commitment to driving innovation and diversity in the beauty industry. Get ready to be inspired by Brianna's unwavering determination, creativity, and commitment to building a brand that celebrates diversity and authenticity in the world of beauty and fragrance.

programme.title: September 16, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for September 16, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guest LisaRaye
programme.desc: LisaRaye is an icon. She’s been a star since her first film Ice Cube’s The Player’s Club and today she’s on ALLBLK’s A House Divided. She’s an amazing woman and we talk about acting, learning how to be sexy, the time she shot someone, and she cries about her beloved late father. An amazing conversation.

programme.title: Dating Mistakes, Sick Kids
programme.desc:
Dating in 2025 can be WILD! This week on the Nessa Off Air Podcast, Nessa and Katrina B are sharing dating stories. Now, even though these two aren’t out in the dating world anymore, their hair and makeup artists Marci and Lino are! And they…have…stories… and Nessa and Katrina B are here to tell them all! This opens up a much bigger conversation about DATING ETIQUETTE in 2025. This is a really fun and interesting conversation and we’re sure there are a lot of opinions out there about this and we want to know what you think!
Next, these two have an important PSA to ALL PARENTS out there: KEEP YOUR SICK KIDS AT HOME!!! Tune into this week’s episode to find out how we got onto this topic and how it matters!

programme.title: The Vegan Roadie - New Sensations in New Orleans
programme.desc: From savory crepes to sandwiches, the French Quarter has your tastebuds covered! Come make a crepe!

programme.title: Vegan Travel with Eunice Reyes - Magnifique Montreal
programme.desc: Montreal is dripping with culture and cuisine and Eunice Reyes takes you on a dazzling food tour.

programme.title: New Day New Chef - Top Chef Winner Shrooms It!
programme.desc: Zuzu won Top Chef Amateur with her gourmet vegan cooking. Now she joins us to make Mushroom Souvlaki

programme.title: Kale Krew - Kale My Name
programme.desc: Kale My Name is the multiple award-winning Chicago vegan restaurant owned by the star of Kale Krew!

programme.title: Animal House!
programme.desc: Watch heroes work with overcrowded, underfunded animal shelters in this uplifting, series!

programme.title: From Hunter to Vegan Sanctuary Owner
programme.desc: Mark Wakeling's dream? Turn all animal farms into animal sanctuaries His personal story is why.

programme.title: Ahimsa & Environment: Making Peace with Nature
programme.desc: Watch Ahimsa & the Environment and learn how you can be the change you wish to see in the world.

programme.title: S4E4 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: S2E7 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: Village of the Vampire
programme.desc: Rebecca is searching for her sister, a young journalist who went missing while investigating a series of unfortunate events. The trail leads her to Timere, a remote place far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life, where amidst the tight lipped silence of the town's inhabitants there's an ever growing fear of dark forces at work and no-one dares to leave their home at night. Here Rebecca meets an extravagant writer, the church warden of the town and above all Caleb, a charming, rich and elegant man whose dark gaze hides a chilling secret. It's in this town, where time appears to move between the shadows and danger lurks around every corner that Rebecca learns of the terrible truth and the battle between good and evil begins...

programme.title: Clown Motel
programme.desc: Clown Motel follows a group of ghost hunters, coming from an old ghost town and a bachelorette party, returning home from Las Vegas. When the groups meet up, by mistake, they're left to discover if the motel is really abandoned and haunted by the souls, of the clowns, that once lived there...

programme.title: Alfredo
programme.desc: Brendan Cobbs, un famoso novelista, es enviado a una remota cabaña de la Inglaterra rural en busca de inspiración para su próxima novela. Cree haber encontrado su próximo tema cuando se encuentra con Alfred, un muñeco del tamaño de un niño que puede cobrar vida. Pero surgen consecuencias mortales cuando Brendan se da cuenta de que Alfred tiene intención de matar.

programme.title: Hotel Dinosaurio
programme.desc: Sienna está desesperada por ganar un gran premio en metálico en un concurso secreto clandestino, pero los dinosaurios comienzan a cazarla para entretenimiento de los ricos y adinerados. ¿Podrá ser la última en sobrevivir a la horrible noche para ganar el premio?

programme.title: Kecksburg
programme.desc: Un reportero investiga un misterioso accidente y descubre algo más que un objeto, sino una enorme conspiración gubernamental. Inspirada en los hechos reales del 9 de diciembre de 1965 y en uno de los incidentes OVNI más misteriosos de Estados Unidos...

programme.title: El Culto de Humpty Dumpty
programme.desc: Un grupo de adolescentes con problemas y su maestra deben luchar por sobrevivir después de descubrir que una secta ha devuelto la vida a Humpty Dumpty, un muñeco asesino, y lo ha liberado en el campamento en el que se encuentran...

programme.title: Calladas Por La Mafia
programme.desc: Un grupo de mujeres son secuestradas y son retenidas ala fuerza y una casería toma dimensiones inesperadas logran escapar del infierno y cobran venganza contra ellos.

programme.title: El Hormigón
programme.desc: El hormigón es un superhéroe que está harto de la mafia de su ciudad y decide combatirla con ayuda del Karate y la salsa.

programme.title: El Patroncito
programme.desc: El Paisa un poderoso narco y su hijo, son de temer. Nadie se mete con ellos sin pagar las consecuencias. El hijo de "El Paisa" levanta al sobrino de Iván por una deuda de coca, desatándose así una guerra entre narcos.

programme.title: El Sonido de los Tulipanes
programme.desc: En Buenos Aires durante la crisis del 2001, Marcelo un escritor devenido en periodista, debe volver sobre los últimos pasos de su padre Tonio un consagrado intelectual de quien se encuentra profundamente distanciado cuando muere en condiciones extrañas. De la mano de Carolina la ex secretaria de su padre, Marcelo se sumerge en un mundo oscuro lleno de violencia y ambiciones de poder enfrentándose a “El Loco” Bertolini. Pero el peligro no solo lo acechará a él sino también a los suyos. ¿Podrá Marcelo encontrar los verdaderos motivos de la muerte de su padre?

programme.title: El Desertor
programme.desc: Luego de ser reclutado para el servicio militar y ante los abusos de su jefe inmediato, el Subteniente Montilla, Julián escapa del cuartel, lo que provoca una feroz persecución por parte de Montilla, quien se ha enamorado de Sagrario y hará todo lo posible para separar a los jóvenes.

programme.title: El Retorno
programme.desc: Una extraña mujer mantiene expectante y desorientado al espectador cuando a diario habla con su hija y la presencia de su hija no aparece en ningún momento. Una historia no previsible que juega al despiste, por lo que, hay que esperar hasta el final para saber lo que está pasando la protagonista.

programme.title: Er Relajo Del Loro
programme.desc: Un loro que tras ser vendido a unos traficantes de animales cuando era pequeño, va pasando de dueño en dueño durante toda su vida y cambiando su nombre de acuerdo a su propietario, mirando frente a sus ojos la evolución de Venezuela durante 50 años (1950/2000).

programme.title: The Juniors y La Formula Imperial
programme.desc: Narra las vidas de 7 adolescentes millonarios que se aventuran a planificar una revolución social, generada por vídeo-escándalos y experimentos médicos, con el objetivo de generar un cambio en la ideología mundial, el conflicto entre las clases sociales y el enfrentamiento con sus muchachas de servicio doméstico.

programme.title: Mi Pequeña Pesadilla
programme.desc: Después de la terrible experiencia y la pérdida de sus amigos, Heather se ve obligada a regresar al Hotel Fear donde Travis se prepara para sus próximas víctimas. Heather debe luchar una vez más.

programme.title: Morirse En Domingo
programme.desc: Julio Salas muere tras una larga enfermedad, pero es domingo y su familia por dificultades económicas se ve forzada a contratar los servicios de una modesta agencia funeraria. El dueño al hacerse cargo del cadáver lo vende a la universidad. El sobrino descubre el negocio y exige que el cuerpo de su tío acabe en el horno crematorio, enamorándose de paso de la hija del incinerador
